description: This file defines a layout component for a Qwik application, including styling, header, main content area, and footer. It also sets cache control headers on HTTP GET requests.

methods.name: onGet
methods.description: Handles GET requests, setting cache control policies for the layout route.

methods.name: component$
methods.description: Defines a Qwik component for the layout.

methods.name: useStyles$
methods.description: Applies CSS styles to the component.
